posts.post_content: Use it to break symmetry on cards like [Stasis](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Stasis). Use it to reuse Evoke creature triggers. Use it in counter-intuitive combos with cards like [Oblivion Ring](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Oblivion Ring), [Faceless Butcher](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Faceless Butcher), [Realm Razer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Realm Razer) or [Tidehollow Sculler](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tidehollow Sculler). Use it defensively, of course, to protect any permanent from removal or control. Here's some versatility.
posts.html:
Use it to break symmetry on cards like Stasis. Use it to reuse Evoke creature triggers. Use it in counter-intuitive combos with cards like Oblivion Ring, Faceless Butcher, Realm Razer or Tidehollow Sculler. Use it defensively, of course, to protect any permanent from removal or control. Here's some versatility.

posts.post_content:
Combo enabler extraordinary. He denies point removal, saves himself if need be, can reset oblivion rings or break symmetry with Stasis or Uba Mask  
  
For a less evil strategy: play him with the best shroud enchantment out there: [Alexi's Cloak](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Alexi's Cloak).

posts.post_content: most fun way to use him (and lose some friends) is to use his ability while oblivion rings exile trigger is on the stack. that way when the "return the permanent" trigger on the ring goes off first and the permanent stays gone. just rinse and repeat to clear everthing u don't like around. it does sound fun with deranged hermit 2 thought, nothing like crazy amounts of squirrels to perk up ur day.

posts.post_content:
Dammit Vedalken Mastermind! As much as I want to love you, I just can't get over my contempt for you! Not because my spirit's been broken from being on your receiving end, but because you're everything poor [Barrin, Master Wizard](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Barrin, Master Wizard) should have been. Why do you, who just came out of nowhere, get to be so amazing while the kindly old scholar languishes unsold in card shops?  
  
It's because you're from the Mirrodin bock, isn't it?
